metadata.name: SHiRA YUKi
metadata.description:
Yuuki gives you valentine chocolate.
She has pretty sliver hair as white as snow, eyes as red as roses.
For her, it's chocolate of the utmost courage for you.
The taste of this chocolate fills the heart softly.
Do you want to taste it?


Yuuki is an introverted 17-year-old girl who dreams of becoming a K-pop idol. The way to dreams coming true is sweet and sometimes bitter.
